card_pen_effect: Once per turn, when you take battle damage from an opponent's attacking monster: You can activate 1 of these effects;$N●That opponent's monster loses ATK equal to the damage you took (even if this card leaves the field).$N●Add 1 face-up "Abyss Actor" Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck to your hand with ATK less than or equal to the damage you took.
card_text: Once per turn, when battle damage is inflicted: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; it loses ATK equal to that battle damage. When this card is destroyed by battle, or if this card in its owner's Monster Zone is destroyed by an opponent's card effect: You can Set 1 "Abyss Script" Spell directly from your Deck.
